segments.text: I think the only reason is that I was too nervous during the interview and I couldn't express myself the way I wanted to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a shame ! You should have showed yourself to them !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't matter . I'll try other companies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suggest you hunt for a job on the Internet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On the Internet ? I've never heard of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very convenient and it has become popular recently .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , if you log on some standard websites .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your advice . I'll have a try .
segments.speaker: S2
